chunks.label: Abstract & Introduction
covers: NP-Class complexity claim; Proposition 1.1 (no polynomial checking); notation

chunks.label: Section 2: Lennard-Jones Problem
covers: LJPn definition; lattices (IC, FC, IF, CB); Propositions 2.1-2.4; search space exponentiality

chunks.label: Section 3: General Assign Problem
covers: GAPn definition; TSPn variants; Propositions 3.2-3.8; properties & enumeration

chunks.label: Section 4: Integer Problem Formulation
covers: IPGAPn formulation; feasible point equivalence; pivot strategies

chunks.label: Section 5: Turing Machine & Finite Automata
covers: TM vs FA comparisons; problems P1-P4; mark-locating complexity analogies

chunks.label: Section 6: Reducibility
covers: Definition 3 (alternatives); tubes; polynomial reduction conditions; Propositions 6.1-6.12; 2D Euclidean TSP tractability; GAPn intractability

chunks.label: Conclusions & Acknowledgment
covers: Summary; frontier analysis; future work on mD cases; quantum computing mention
